verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> for yourself a <S%H5695>calf,<s%> a <S%H1121>bull,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> [both] <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> [them] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Then to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>'Take<s%> a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and a <S%H5695>calf<s%> and a <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> both one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%>

and an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil;<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> to you.' "

So they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>do,<s%> that the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may <S%H7200>appear<s%> to you."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H7126>"Come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> your <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> that you may <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for yourself and for the <S%H5971>people;<s%> then <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7133>offering<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you may <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for himself.

And Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> to him; and he <S%H2881>dipped<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [some] on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> out [the rest of] the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

The <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> he then <S%H6999>offered<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> however, he <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Then he <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>handed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> to him and he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And they <S%H4672>handed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to him in <S%H5409>pieces<s%> with the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he <S%H6999>offered<s%> [them] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He also <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and <S%H6999>offered<s%> [them] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> with the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Then he <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for the people, and <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> it and <S%H2398>offered<s%> it for <S%H2398>sin,<s%> like the <S%H7223>first.<s%>
He also <S%H7126>presented<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H6213>offered<s%> it according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%>

Next he <S%H7126>presented<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3709>hand<s%> with <S%H4480>some<s%> of it and <S%H6999>offered<s%> [it] up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Then he <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and the <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and Aaron's <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4672>handed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> to him and he <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

As for the <S%H2459>portions<s%> of <S%H2459>fat<s%> from the <S%H7794>ox<s%> and from the <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H451>fat<s%> <S%H451>tail,<s%> and the [fat] <S%H4374>covering,<s%> and the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%>
they now <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2459>portions<s%> of <S%H2459>fat<s%> on the <S%H2373>breasts;<s%> and he <S%H6999>offered<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H2373>breasts<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>presented<s%> as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

Then <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and he <S%H3381>stepped<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> after <S%H6213>making<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> When they <S%H3318>came<s%> out and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2459>portions<s%> of <S%H2459>fat<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it], they <S%H7442>shouted<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>
